problem_names: lemma fact_ineq: "n \<ge> 1 \<Longrightarrow> fact n + k \<le> fact (n + k)"

lemma Ints_sum:
  assumes "\<And>x. x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> f x \<in> \<int>"
  shows   "sum f A \<in> \<int>"

lemma suminf_split_initial_segment':
  "summable (f :: nat \<Rightarrow> 'a::real_normed_vector) \<Longrightarrow> 
       suminf f = (\<Sum>n. f (n + k + 1)) + sum f {..k}"
lemma Rats_eq_int_div_int': "(\<rat> :: real set) = {of_int p / of_int q |p q. q > 0}"

lemma Rats_cases':
  assumes "(x :: real) \<in> \<rat>"
  obtains p q where "q > 0" "x = of_int p / of_int q"

lemma int_poly_rat_no_root_ge: 
  fixes p :: "real poly" and a b :: int
  assumes "\<And>n. coeff p n \<in> \<int>"
  assumes "b > 0" "poly p (a / b) \<noteq> 0"
  defines "n \<equiv> degree p"
  shows   "abs (poly p (a / b)) \<ge> 1 / of_int b ^ n"
translations: lemma fact_ineq: "n \<ge> 1 \<Longrightarrow> fact n + k \<le> fact (n + k)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 1 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> fact n + k \<le> fact (n + k)
proof (induction k)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. 1 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> fact n + 0 \<le> fact (n + 0)
 2. \<And>k.
       \<lbrakk>1 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> fact n + k \<le> fact (n + k);
        1 \<le> n\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> fact n + Suc k \<le> fact (n + Suc k)
case (Suc k)

proof (state)
this:
  1 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> fact n + k \<le> fact (n + k)
  1 \<le> n

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. 1 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> fact n + 0 \<le> fact (n + 0)
 2. \<And>k.
       \<lbrakk>1 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> fact n + k \<le> fact (n + k);
        1 \<le> n\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> fact n + Suc k \<le> fact (n + Suc k)
from Suc

proof (chain)
picking this:
  1 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> fact n + k \<le> fact (n + k)
  1 \<le> n
have "fact n + Suc k \<le> fact (n + k) + 1"

proof (prove)
using this:
  1 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> fact n + k \<le> fact (n + k)
  1 \<le> n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fact n + Suc k \<le> fact (n + k) + 1
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  fact n + Suc k \<le> fact (n + k) + 1

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. 1 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> fact n + 0 \<le> fact (n + 0)
 2. \<And>k.
       \<lbrakk>1 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> fact n + k \<le> fact (n + k);
        1 \<le> n\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> fact n + Suc k \<le> fact (n + Suc k)
also

proof (state)
this:
  fact n + Suc k \<le> fact (n + k) + 1

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. 1 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> fact n + 0 \<le> fact (n + 0)
 2. \<And>k.
       \<lbrakk>1 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> fact n + k \<le> fact (n + k);
        1 \<le> n\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> fact n + Suc k \<le> fact (n + Suc k)
from Suc

proof (chain)
picking this:
  1 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> fact n + k \<le> fact (n + k)
  1 \<le> n
have "\<dots> \<le> fact (n + Suc k)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  1 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> fact n + k \<le> fact (n + k)
  1 \<le> n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fact (n + k) + 1 \<le> fact (n + Suc k)
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  fact (n + k) + 1 \<le> fact (n + Suc k)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. 1 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> fact n + 0 \<le> fact (n + 0)
 2. \<And>k.
       \<lbrakk>1 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> fact n + k \<le> fact (n + k);
        1 \<le> n\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> fact n + Suc k \<le> fact (n + Suc k)
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  fact n + Suc k \<le> fact (n + Suc k)
show ?case

proof (prove)
using this:
  fact n + Suc k \<le> fact (n + Suc k)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. fact n + Suc k \<le> fact (n + Suc k)

proof (state)
this:
  fact n + Suc k \<le> fact (n + Suc k)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 1 \<le> n \<Longrightarrow> fact n + 0 \<le> fact (n + 0)
qed simp_all

lemma Ints_sum:
  assumes "\<And>x. x \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> f x \<in> \<int>"
  shows   "sum f A \<in> \<int>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sum f A \<in> \<int>

by (cases "finite A", insert assms, induction A rule: finite_induct)
     (auto intro!: Ints_add)

lemma suminf_split_initial_segment':
  "summable (f :: nat \<Rightarrow> 'a::real_normed_vector) \<Longrightarrow> 
       suminf f = (\<Sum>n. f (n + k + 1)) + sum f {..k}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. summable f \<Longrightarrow>
    suminf f = (\<Sum>n. f (n + k + 1)) + sum f {..k}

by (subst suminf_split_initial_segment[of _ "Suc k"], assumption, subst lessThan_Suc_atMost) 
     simp_all
lemma Rats_eq_int_div_int': "(\<rat> :: real set) = {of_int p / of_int q |p q. q > 0}"
proof safe

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<in> \<rat> \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>p q. x = real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<and> 0 < q
 2. \<And>x p q.
       0 < q \<Longrightarrow> real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<in> \<rat>
fix x :: real

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<in> \<rat> \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>p q. x = real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<and> 0 < q
 2. \<And>x p q.
       0 < q \<Longrightarrow> real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<in> \<rat>
assume "x \<in> \<rat>"

proof (state)
this:
  x \<in> \<rat>

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<in> \<rat> \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>p q. x = real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<and> 0 < q
 2. \<And>x p q.
       0 < q \<Longrightarrow> real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<in> \<rat>
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<in> \<rat>
obtain p q where pq: "x = of_int p / of_int q" "q \<noteq> 0"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> \<rat>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>p q.
        \<lbrakk>x = real_of_int p / real_of_int q; q \<noteq> 0\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by (subst (asm) Rats_eq_int_div_int) auto

proof (state)
this:
  x = real_of_int p / real_of_int q
  q \<noteq> 0

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x.
       x \<in> \<rat> \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>p q. x = real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<and> 0 < q
 2. \<And>x p q.
       0 < q \<Longrightarrow> real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<in> \<rat>
show "\<exists>p q. x = real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<and> 0 < q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>p q. x = real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<and> 0 < q
proof (cases "q > 0")

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. 0 < q \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>p q. x = real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<and> 0 < q
 2. \<not> 0 < q \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>p q. x = real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<and> 0 < q
case False

proof (state)
this:
  \<not> 0 < q

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. 0 < q \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>p q. x = real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<and> 0 < q
 2. \<not> 0 < q \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>p q. x = real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<and> 0 < q
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>p q. x = real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<and> 0 < q
by (rule exI[of _ "-p"], rule exI[of _ "-q"]) (insert False pq, auto)

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>p q. x = real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<and> 0 < q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 0 < q \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>p q. x = real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<and> 0 < q
qed (insert pq, force)

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>p q. x = real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<and> 0 < q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x p q.
       0 < q \<Longrightarrow> real_of_int p / real_of_int q \<in> \<rat>
qed auto

lemma Rats_cases':
  assumes "(x :: real) \<in> \<rat>"
  obtains p q where "q > 0" "x = of_int p / of_int q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>q p.
        \<lbrakk>0 < q; x = real_of_int p / real_of_int q\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> \<rat>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>q p.
        \<lbrakk>0 < q; x = real_of_int p / real_of_int q\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by (subst (asm) Rats_eq_int_div_int') auto

text \<open>
  The following inequality gives a lower bound for the absolute value of an 
  integer polynomial at a rational point that is not a root.
\<close>

lemma int_poly_rat_no_root_ge: 
  fixes p :: "real poly" and a b :: int
  assumes "\<And>n. coeff p n \<in> \<int>"
  assumes "b > 0" "poly p (a / b) \<noteq> 0"
  defines "n \<equiv> degree p"
  shows   "abs (poly p (a / b)) \<ge> 1 / of_int b ^ n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 1 / real_of_int b ^ n
    \<le> \<bar>poly p (real_of_int a / real_of_int b)\<bar>
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 1 / real_of_int b ^ n
    \<le> \<bar>poly p (real_of_int a / real_of_int b)\<bar>
let ?S = "(\<Sum>i\<le>n. coeff p i * of_int a ^ i * (of_int b ^ (n - i)))"

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 1 / real_of_int b ^ n
    \<le> \<bar>poly p (real_of_int a / real_of_int b)\<bar>
from \<open>b > 0\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  0 < b
have eq: "?S = of_int b ^ n * poly p (a / b)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  0 < b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Sum>i\<le>n.
        coeff p i * real_of_int a ^ i * real_of_int b ^ (n - i)) =
    real_of_int b ^ n * poly p (real_of_int a / real_of_int b)
by (simp add: poly_altdef power_divide mult_ac n_def sum_distrib_left power_diff)

proof (state)
this:
  (\<Sum>i\<le>n. coeff p i * real_of_int a ^ i * real_of_int b ^ (n - i)) =
  real_of_int b ^ n * poly p (real_of_int a / real_of_int b)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 1 / real_of_int b ^ n
    \<le> \<bar>poly p (real_of_int a / real_of_int b)\<bar>
have "?S \<in> \<int>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Sum>i\<le>n. coeff p i * real_of_int a ^ i * real_of_int b ^ (n - i))
    \<in> \<int>
by (intro Ints_sum Ints_mult assms Ints_power) simp_all

proof (state)
this:
  (\<Sum>i\<le>n. coeff p i * real_of_int a ^ i * real_of_int b ^ (n - i))
  \<in> \<int>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 1 / real_of_int b ^ n
    \<le> \<bar>poly p (real_of_int a / real_of_int b)\<bar>
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  (\<Sum>i\<le>n. coeff p i * real_of_int a ^ i * real_of_int b ^ (n - i))
  \<in> \<int>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 1 / real_of_int b ^ n
    \<le> \<bar>poly p (real_of_int a / real_of_int b)\<bar>
from assms

proof (chain)
picking this:
  coeff p ?n \<in> \<int>
  0 < b
  poly p (real_of_int a / real_of_int b) \<noteq> 0
  n \<equiv> degree p
have "?S \<noteq> 0"

proof (prove)
using this:
  coeff p ?n \<in> \<int>
  0 < b
  poly p (real_of_int a / real_of_int b) \<noteq> 0
  n \<equiv> degree p

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Sum>i\<le>n.
        coeff p i * real_of_int a ^ i * real_of_int b ^ (n - i)) \<noteq>
    0
by (subst eq) auto

proof (state)
this:
  (\<Sum>i\<le>n.
      coeff p i * real_of_int a ^ i * real_of_int b ^ (n - i)) \<noteq>
  0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 1 / real_of_int b ^ n
    \<le> \<bar>poly p (real_of_int a / real_of_int b)\<bar>
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (\<Sum>i\<le>n. coeff p i * real_of_int a ^ i * real_of_int b ^ (n - i))
  \<in> \<int>
  (\<Sum>i\<le>n.
      coeff p i * real_of_int a ^ i * real_of_int b ^ (n - i)) \<noteq>
  0
have "abs ?S \<ge> 1"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (\<Sum>i\<le>n. coeff p i * real_of_int a ^ i * real_of_int b ^ (n - i))
  \<in> \<int>
  (\<Sum>i\<le>n.
      coeff p i * real_of_int a ^ i * real_of_int b ^ (n - i)) \<noteq>
  0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 1 \<le> \<bar>\<Sum>i\<le>n.
                     coeff p i * real_of_int a ^ i *
                     real_of_int b ^ (n - i)\<bar>
by (elim Ints_cases) simp

proof (state)
this:
  1 \<le> \<bar>\<Sum>i\<le>n.
                   coeff p i * real_of_int a ^ i *
                   real_of_int b ^ (n - i)\<bar>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 1 / real_of_int b ^ n
    \<le> \<bar>poly p (real_of_int a / real_of_int b)\<bar>
with eq \<open>b > 0\<close>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (\<Sum>i\<le>n. coeff p i * real_of_int a ^ i * real_of_int b ^ (n - i)) =
  real_of_int b ^ n * poly p (real_of_int a / real_of_int b)
  0 < b
  1 \<le> \<bar>\<Sum>i\<le>n.
                   coeff p i * real_of_int a ^ i *
                   real_of_int b ^ (n - i)\<bar>
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  (\<Sum>i\<le>n. coeff p i * real_of_int a ^ i * real_of_int b ^ (n - i)) =
  real_of_int b ^ n * poly p (real_of_int a / real_of_int b)
  0 < b
  1 \<le> \<bar>\<Sum>i\<le>n.
                   coeff p i * real_of_int a ^ i *
                   real_of_int b ^ (n - i)\<bar>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 1 / real_of_int b ^ n
    \<le> \<bar>poly p (real_of_int a / real_of_int b)\<bar>
by (simp add: field_simps abs_mult)

proof (state)
this:
  1 / real_of_int b ^ n
  \<le> \<bar>poly p (real_of_int a / real_of_int b)\<bar>

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
